value.name: With large turnout, Noankers pass budget and hear updates in annual meeting
value.description: The Noank Fire District Executive Committee saw an impressive turnout at its annual meeting Wednesday night but no shakeups, as the increased budget and tax rate passed handily and Noank Fire District Zoning Commission Chairman Rick Smith fended off a challenge to his seat.
